title: Facilities - Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
description: Discover our comprehensive range of modern facilities at Lamb Cottage Caravan Park. From luxury shower rooms to laundry facilities, we provide everything you need for a comfortable stay.

hero.title: Our Facilities
hero.subtitle: Modern amenities for your comfort and convenience

shower_rooms.title: Luxury Shower Rooms
shower_rooms.description: Our luxury shower rooms provide a comfortable and private bathing experience with modern fixtures and constant hot water.

laundry.title: Laundry Facilities
laundry.description: Keep your clothes fresh and clean with our modern laundry facilities, perfect for longer stays.

hair_dryers.title: Hair Dryers
hair_dryers.description: Professional-grade hair dryers are conveniently located in our shower facilities.

dishwashing.title: Dishwashing Area
dishwashing.description: Clean and hygienic dishwashing facilities with all the essentials provided for your convenience.

disabled_suite.title: Disabled Suite
disabled_suite.description: Fully accessible facilities designed to meet the needs of guests with mobility requirements.

dog_walking.title: Dog Walking Area
dog_walking.description: A secure and well-equipped area where your four-legged friends can exercise and play safely.

electric_hookups.title: Electric Hook-ups
electric_hookups.details: Every pitch comes with a reliable 16amp electrical connection, perfect for powering your caravan, motorhome, or camping equipment.

wifi.title: Free WiFi
wifi.description: Complimentary wireless internet throughout the site
wifi.details: Stay connected with our free WiFi service available across the entire park, perfect for keeping in touch or planning your next adventure.

water_points.title: Fresh Water
water_points.description: Multiple water points across the site
water_points.details: Convenient fresh water access points are strategically located throughout the park for easy filling of water containers and tanks.

waste_disposal.title: Waste Disposal
waste_disposal.description: Chemical toilet disposal and grey water drainage
waste_disposal.details: Proper waste disposal facilities including chemical toilet emptying points and grey water drainage for motorhomes and caravans.

included_banner.title: All Facilities Included
included_banner.description: All our luxury facilities are included in your pitch fee - no hidden charges or extra costs for using our amenities

maintenance.cleaning_schedule: All facilities are cleaned twice daily
maintenance.maintenance_day: Weekly deep cleaning every Wednesday morning
maintenance.emergency_contact: For any facility issues, please contact reception immediately
